com.github.cwilper.fcrepo.dto.core.io
Class ContentResolvingDTOWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.github.cwilper.fcrepo.dto.core.io.ContentResolvingDTOWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
DTOWriter
public abstract class ContentResolvingDTOWriter
extends Object
implements DTOWriter

Base class of DTOWriter implementations capable of resolving content.

Field Summary
protected  URI baseURI
           
protected  ContentResolver contentResolver
           
 
Constructor Summary
protected ContentResolvingDTOWriter()
          Creates an instance with a DefaultContentResolver which is guaranteed to be closed by the time the writer is closed.

          Releases all resources associated with this writer.

Constructor Detail

ContentResolvingDTOWriter

protected ContentResolvingDTOWriter()
Creates an instance with a DefaultContentResolver which is guaranteed to be closed by the time the writer is closed.

Method Detail

setContentResolver

public void setContentResolver(ContentResolver contentResolver)
Sets the content resolver. If the new content resolver is different from the default, and the default is still in use, it will be automatically closed.

Parameters:
contentResolver - the new value, never null.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the value is null.

getContentResolver

public ContentResolver getContentResolver()
Gets the content resolver.

Returns:
the value, never null.

setBaseURI

public void setBaseURI(URI baseURI)
Sets the base URI to use when relative URIs need to be resolved.

Parameters:
baseURI - the new value, possibly null.

close

@PreDestroy
public void close()
Description copied from interface: DTOWriter
Releases all resources associated with this writer. This can be safely called multiple times.

Specified by:
close in interface DTOWriter
